name: Mentor
description: Serves as the wise guide who teaches and protects the party, passing on knowledge and magical gifts that prove crucial to their success. These characters embody wisdom gained through experience and often sacrifice themselves for the greater good.

name: Herald
description: Delivers the call to adventure or important news that sets events in motion, serving as the catalyst that draws heroes from their ordinary world into extraordinary circumstances.

name: Threshold Guardian
description: They can proceed to new challenges, representing the obstacles that must be overcome to prove heroic capability.

name: Shapeshifter
description: Creates uncertainty and mystery through changing loyalties and nature, keeping players guessing about true motivations and allegiances.

name: Shadow
description: Represents the dark reflection of the heroes, embodying their suppressed fears, desires, or potential for corruption.

name: Trickster
description: Disrupts established order and creates unexpected complications through chaotic behavior that can help or hinder the party.

name: Ally
description: Provides ongoing support and companionship, standing with the party through trials and tribulations.

name: Temptress/Tempter
description: Uses allure and persuasion to lead the party astray from their mission, representing the seductive power of abandoning duty for personal desires.

name: Primary Villain
description: Serves as the main antagonist opposing the party's goals, providing the central source of conflict that drives the overarching narrative.

name: Lieutenant
description: Functions as a secondary villain serving the main antagonist, often serving as the direct threat while the primary villain operates from the shadows.

name: Rival
description: Competes with the party for similar goals, staying one step ahead and creating a sense of urgency and competition.

name: Nemesis
description: Maintains a personal enmity with specific party members, driven by past wrongs or fundamental ideological differences.

name: False Friend
description: Appears as an ally but betrays the party at crucial moments, teaching hard lessons about trust and perception.

name: Corrupt Authority
description: Abuses official power to oppose the party, representing institutional evil and systemic oppression.

name: Fanatic
description: Pursues extreme beliefs that put them at odds with the party, creating moral complexity through sincere but misguided conviction.

name: Fallen Hero
description: Represents a former champion turned to darkness, showing the potential consequences of failure or corruption.

name: Dark Mirror
description: Serves as an antagonist who represents what the party could become if they made different choices.

name: Puppet Master
description: Manipulates events from hidden positions, creating the sense of a larger conspiracy working against the heroes.

name: Benefactor
description: Provides resources and support from positions of wealth or influence, often expecting nothing in return but creating bonds of gratitude.

name: Employer
description: Hires the party for specific tasks, establishing clear professional relationships with defined expectations and rewards.

name: Client
description: Seeks the party's services for personal problems, creating intimate stakes where success or failure affects individual lives.

name: Contact
description: Offers information, connections, or specialized services, serving as a gateway to larger networks and opportunities.

name: Informant
description: Secretly provides information about enemies or hidden activities, creating relationships built on trust and shared risk.

name: Confidant
description: Listens to the party's problems and provides emotional support, serving as a safe harbor for personal struggles.

name: Protégé
description: Looks to the party for guidance and teaching, creating mentorship relationships that develop over time.

name: Dependent
description: Relies on the party for care or protection, establishing ongoing responsibilities and emotional connections.

name: Love Interest
description: Provides romantic partnership or potential, adding personal stakes and emotional complexity to adventures.

name: Ex-Partner
description: Brings complicated history from former romantic or business relationships, creating tension and unresolved issues.

name: Parent
description: Serves as father or mother figure, whether biological or adoptive, providing wisdom, protection, and unconditional love.

name: Sibling
description: Shares blood ties and common history, creating relationships marked by rivalry, loyalty, and deep understanding.

name: Child
description: Represents the party's legacy and future, creating protective instincts and long-term investment in outcomes.

name: Grandparent
description: Offers elder wisdom and stories of the past, connecting the party to larger historical narratives.

name: Uncle/Aunt
description: Provides extended family support with different perspectives, often serving as alternative mentors or confidants.

name: Cousin
description: Shares extended family connections with similar age and experiences, creating peer relationships within family structures.

name: In-Law
description: Brings family connections through marriage, creating complex dynamics between different family traditions.

name: Step-Family
description: Represents family bonds formed through remarriage, with developing relationships and potential conflicts.

name: Godparent
description: Establishes chosen family connections with spiritual or mentoring obligations, creating non-blood family bonds.

name: Ancestor
description: Appears as spirits or in flashbacks, connecting the party to their heritage and providing guidance from beyond.

name: Merchant
description: Trades goods and services while providing equipment and market information, serving as economic hubs in communities.

name: Craftsman
description: Creates items and shares specialized trade knowledge, representing the skilled artisans who build civilization.

name: Scholar
description: Provides research capabilities, lore, and intellectual expertise, serving as repositories of knowledge and learning.

name: Healer
description: Tends to wounds and illnesses while offering medical expertise, representing mercy and restoration in harsh worlds.

name: Innkeeper
description: Offers lodging and local gossip, serving as community information centers and safe gathering places.

name: Guide
description: Provides local expertise about terrain and dangers, helping parties navigate unfamiliar territories safely.

name: Guard
description: Protects people, places, or things professionally, representing order and security in chaotic times.

name: Spy
description: Gathers intelligence while operating in shadows, providing access to hidden information and covert operations.

name: Diplomat
description: Handles political and social negotiations, representing civilized discourse and peaceful resolution of conflicts.

name: Entertainer
description: Lifts spirits and spreads news through artistic expression, serving as cultural ambassadors and morale boosters.

name: Noble
description: Wields political power and resources through high birth, representing established authority and aristocratic values.

name: Peasant
description: Represents everyday struggles of common folk, providing ground-level perspectives on how grand events affect ordinary lives.

name: Clergy
description: Holds spiritual authority and divine connections, serving as intermediaries between mortal and divine realms.

name: Outcast
description: Lives on society's margins after exile or rejection, providing alternative perspectives and desperate motivations.

name: Refugee
description: Seeks safety and new homes after displacement, representing vulnerability and the costs of conflict.

name: Criminal
description: Operates outside social norms as a lawbreaker, providing access to underground networks and illegal activities.

name: Veteran
description: Brings combat experience and war stories, representing the personal costs of conflict and martial expertise.

name: Foreigner
description: Offers different cultural perspectives as an outsider, providing exotic knowledge and alternative worldviews.

name: Servant
description: Works in bound service to others, possibly possessing hidden knowledge from their positions of invisible observation.

name: Elder
description: Commands community respect through wisdom and influence, representing tradition and accumulated life experience.

name: Quest Giver
description: Provides missions and objectives for the party to pursue, serving as the primary source of adventure hooks and direction.

name: Gatekeeper
description: Controls access to important locations, information, or people, creating obstacles that must be overcome or negotiated.

name: Witness
description: Has observed important events and can provide crucial testimony, serving as living evidence of past occurrences.

name: Victim
description: Suffers harm and needs the party's help for rescue or justice, providing moral imperatives and emotional stakes.

name: Messenger
description: Delivers important communications between parties, serving as information conduits and plot advancement mechanisms.

name: Trader
description: Facilitates exchanges of goods, services, or information, serving as economic and social connection points.

name: Riddle-Master
description: Poses challenges that test the party's wit and wisdom, providing intellectual obstacles beyond combat.

name: Oracle
description: Provides prophecies, visions, or cryptic guidance about future events, offering foreshadowing and dramatic irony.

name: Collector
description: Seeks specific items or information that the party might possess, creating opportunities for negotiation and exchange.

name: Chronicler
description: Records events and spreads the party's reputation, serving as in-world mechanisms for fame and recognition.

name: Sidekick
description: Serves as loyal companion who follows the party on adventures, providing consistent support and friendship.

name: Henchman
description: Acts as devoted follower serving the party's interests, offering reliable assistance in various endeavors.

name: Backup
description: Provides reliable support when most needed, serving as cavalry that arrives at crucial moments.

name: Specialist
description: Offers expertise in specific skills the party lacks, filling gaps in party capabilities and knowledge.

name: Cheerleader
description: Provides emotional support and encouragement, maintaining morale during difficult times.

name: Network Node
description: Connects the party to larger organizations or groups, providing access to broader resources and influence.

name: Safe Harbor
description: Offers sanctuary and refuge in times of danger, providing secure bases for rest and recovery.

name: Resource Provider
description: Supplies equipment, money, or other material needs, serving as reliable sources for adventuring supplies.

name: Advisor
description: Offers strategic counsel and wisdom, helping the party make better decisions through experienced guidance.

name: Champion
description: Advocates for the party in social or political situations, providing representation and influence in complex scenarios.

name: Adversarial Ally
description: Supports the party while disagreeing with their methods or goals, creating tension between alliance and opposition.

name: Reluctant Helper
description: Assists the party grudgingly due to obligation or coercion, providing aid without enthusiasm or full commitment.

name: Reformed Enemy
description: Represents former foes who now aid the party, with trust still building and past conflicts creating ongoing tension.

name: Double Agent
description: Works for multiple sides with unclear ultimate loyalties, creating uncertainty about true motivations and allegiances.

name: Tragic Figure
description: Embodies circumstances that create moral complexity, forcing the party to grapple with difficult ethical decisions.

name: Wild Card
description: Acts unpredictably in ways that can help or hinder the party, creating uncertainty and forcing adaptability.

name: Catalyst
description: Triggers important events through their presence or actions, serving as the spark that ignites larger conflicts or changes.

name: Crossroads
description: Forces the party to make difficult moral or strategic choices, serving as decision points that define character development.

name: Mirror
description: Reflects the party's qualities back at them for better or worse, providing opportunities for self-examination and growth.

name: Evolution
description: Grows and changes throughout the campaign, creating dynamic relationships that develop alongside the story.
